name: The Cabbage Code
description:
The Cabbage Code is a game that was designed to be difficult to complete alone.  

You are encouraged to collaborate with others in order to crack the code.

Getting to the end will require creative thinking and a keen eye.  

The clues will be plentiful, but the hints will be sparse.

So get creative...

Find the clues...

And CRACK THE CODE!!

Good luck...

downtherabbithole
